name: Rhythm Rush
description: Two adventurers are on a journey to reap the land of strange monsters that entered their world. Work as a team and hit to the beat, building up your chain and unleash team attacks to deal heavy damage to a plethora of intense boss battles.Will you be able to keep up to the tunes, or will you drown in the sound? Rhythm Rush is a cooperative boss rush rhythm game starring Sax and Xy.
